attributes.name: HelloSign
attributes.description:
A component to open the HelloSign contract. Usage:

{{hello-sign
  url=signUrl
  key=key
  allowCancel=false
  debug=true
  skipDomainVerification=true
  height=320
  onEventInvalid=(action "handleEventInvalid")
  onEventCanceled=(action "handleEventCanceled")
  onEventError=(action "handleEventError")
  onEventSigned=(action "handleEventSigned")
}}

arguments.name: url
arguments.description: Signature url you fetched via the API on your server

arguments.name: allowCancel
arguments.description: Whether to allow the user to cancel i.e. close the iFrame without signing (default is true)

arguments.name: redirectUrl
arguments.description: Where the user will be redirected after signing

arguments.name: debug
arguments.description: Enables debug output to console.log (default is false)

arguments.name: skipDomainVerification
arguments.description: Whether or not to skip the domain verification step (default is false). This will work only if the Signature Request was created with test_mode=1.

arguments.name: height
arguments.description: The height of the iFrame in pixels. NOTE: Only applicable when a container is specified.

arguments.name: containerElement
arguments.description: DOM element that will contain the iframe on the page (default = document.body)

arguments.name: uxVersion
arguments.description: Integer. The version of the embedded user experience to display to signers (1 = legacy, 2 = responsive). This option is only honored if your account has accessed the API prior to Nov 14, 2015.

arguments.name: hideHeader
arguments.description: When true, the header will be hidden (default = false). This is only functional for customers with embedded branding enabled.

arguments.name: onEventCanceled
arguments.description: A callback to handle HelloSign's canceled event.

arguments.name: onEventError
arguments.description: A callback to handle HelloSign's error event.

arguments.name: onEventInvalid
arguments.description: A callback to handle an invalid event.

arguments.name: onEventSigned
arguments.description: A callback to handle HelloSign's signed event.

arguments.name: requester
arguments.description: The email of the person issuing a signature request. Required for allowing 'Me + Others' requests

arguments.name: whiteLabelingOptions
arguments.description: An associative array to be used to customize the app's signer page

arguments.name: healthCheckTimeoutMs
arguments.description: The number of milliseconds to wait for a response from the iframe. If no response after that time the iframe will be closed. 15000 milliseconds is recommended.
